com.metricstream.systemi.client.servlet.servant

Class Dmsservlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metricstream.systemi.client.servlet.servant.Dmsservlet

  • public class Dmsservlet
extends java.lang.Object
    Servlet class used by the JVue server for DMS related activities. Examples of some activities are retreiving document, retriving annotations of the document, saving annotations etc.
